Check out the commands and parameters below.
**Only the __server owner__ can view and modify settings.**

help_description: Make sure the bot has a high role on the server.
help_value_one:
</ping:1270696551400079428> - shows the bot's status and ping
</settings:1270696551400079430> - displays your guild's settings
</setup whitelist:1334464985945870398> - adds roles to the guild's whitelist
</setup ban_users:1334464985945870398> - enables the feature to block invites and blacklist users
</setup logchannel:1333589448201470059> - assigns a Webhook for logs
</warns:1327751903269879879> - view a user's warning list
bug_succeffsull: The bug has been sent successfully. Thank you for support!
